title: What's news in v2.42.0
content:
Features:
  - Brand new customizable keyboard shortcuts system with a lot more shortcuts
  - Rotsprite for content rotation

Enhancements:
  - Moving and transforming are available as soon as a selection is made
  - New file dimension text fields can take simple math expressions
  - Added an option to reset layout in Settings > Canvas
  - Reference layer can be displayed outside of the canvas
  - Fixed file previews sometimes don't load
  - Export screen shows the result dimensions before exporting
  - Canvas has a border now

Fixes:
  - Large icon preview not working after relaunching
  - Fixed precise move tap again
